column1: Willows were waterside trees that grew throughout Middle-earth. The most famous of these was the ancient tree known as Old Man Willow
column2: on the banks of the Withywindle in the Old Forest.

column1: In Beleriand was the region Nan-tathren
column2: a wooded vale which took its name from the willow trees that grew there.

column1: The Sindarin name for "willow" is tathar.
